title: Salesforce stock pops after report says Starboard owns a 'significant' stake in software giant; Starboard founder reportedly said Salesforce shares have been weighed down by 'sub-par mix of growth and profitability'
text:
Starboard didn't immediately respond to a MarketWatch request for confirmation of the stake, nor did a Salesforce representative.

Salesforce shares are down 50% over a 12-month span, as the S&P 500 SPX has lost 18% and as the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, of which Salesforce is a component, has declined 14%.

Salesforce stock pops after report says Starboard owns a 'significant' stake in software giant
